column5: Build on a first degree or your prior experience in electrical or electronic engineering and develop new technical skills at an advanced level.Our Master's in Electrical Power Engineering builds on your existing knowledge and explores how modern power systems are designed and built. Students on this course develop their technical skills and advanced knowledge while specialising in the field of electrical power. You'll also develop your professional, analytical and management skills, and gain insight into the issues that relate to the management of an engineering business.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
